New Records: Rilee Rossouw became the first Proteas man to reach a century in the T20 World Cup
Key Match Events: Rilee Rossouw scored 109 off 56 balls, Quinton de Kock contributed 63 as they put on a tournament record 163 for the second wicket
Miscellaneous Highlights: Some rain threatened the match but did not affect the outcome
Others: Anrich Nortje took 4 wickets for 10 runs, Tabraiz Shamsi took 3 wickets for 20 runs, Bangladesh were bowled out for 101
